member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_LUMA_KEY
member.summary: Specifies the settings used for luma keying. This value is used with the structure.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_LUMA_KEY.Enable
member.summary: A boolean value specifying whether luma keying is enabled.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_LUMA_KEY.Lower
member.summary: The lower bound for the luma key. The valid range is [0…1]. If Enable is FALSE, this parameter is ignored.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_LUMA_KEY.Upper
member.summary: The upper bound for the luma key. The valid range is [0…1]. If Enable is FALSE, this parameter is ignored.
